DOC.brief_summary: The objective study : - Examine tolerability two formulation two dose concentration epinastine . - Select formulation ( ) epinastine future study evaluate individual sensory attribute score Nasal Spray Evaluation Questionnaire ( NSEQ ) collect study drug administration subject preference ranking assess completion study . - Compare preference two formulation two dose concentration epinastine compare azelastine follow single dose randomize , double-blind , two-cohort , three-period crossover design .
DOC.brief_title: Two Formulations Concentrations Epinastine Nasal Spray Versus Azelastine Nasal Solution Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: age 1870 history SAR PAR 1 year mild symptom asthma RAD respiratory tract infection within 14 day prior screen
